item.description:
ğŸ‰ v2.0 â€“ Glowing Panda: The Update You've Been Waiting For (Sort Of) ğŸ˜œ

We're thrilled to announce the release of Glowing Panda version 2.0! ğŸŠ This major update brings numerous improvements and new features that will make your app-building experience even more enjoyable.


ğŸ¤” What's New? ğŸ¤“

  • Rewritten Layout: The Speed Demon ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸ Our layout has been reworked for better performance, making it faster and smoother. We've also added some fancy animations to keep things interesting ğŸ˜
  • Polished Managers: The Playback Pro ğŸµ Playback managers have been revamped to ensure a seamless experience. No more buffering or crashes â€“ we've got this covered ğŸ’ª
  • Calendar & Music Activity: The Visual Showstopper ğŸ“† A fancy blur background behind music activity has been added to enhance the app's visual appeal. It's like a mini-movie in your app ğŸ¿
  • Customization Options: Make it Yours (Sort Of) ğŸ¨ More customization options have been introduced to personalize your glow. We've also added some new emojis to make things more fun ğŸ¤ª
  • Improved Settings: Don't Lose Your Stuff ğŸ—‚ï¸ New and improved settings that actually save changes ğŸ”„. No more wondering where you put that pesky setting ğŸ”
  • Resource Management Optimizations: The Secret Sauce âš™ï¸ Our resource management has been optimized for a faster app. We've also added some secret sauce (just kidding, it's just good old-fashioned coding magic âœ¨)
  • Bug Fixes: ğŸš« We've squashed some pesky bugs that caused issues with HUDs and Download Manager settings, shelf icon responsiveness, and General tab in Settings.
  • Update Check: ğŸ”„ A new feature to check for updates in the Settings / About section has been added.
  • Non-Notch Display Customization: ğŸ–¥ï¸ Customization options for non-notch displays have been introduced to ensure a seamless experience for all users.
  • GitHub Link Update: ğŸ”„ The GitHub link in the settings has been updated to ensure easy access to the latest updates.
